mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dynamic_msg ( uid, user_name, headimgurl, msg_type, anonymity, title, description, business_address, business_name, price, reward, requirements, pics, location, geo_id, msg_date,msg_end_date,msg_2level_type,msg_single_type,price_des,msg_state,apply_num,seat_num,start_place,aim_place ) SELECT u.uid, u.nickname, u.headimgurl, #{msgType}, #{anonymity}, #{title}, #{description}, #{businessAddress}, #{businessName}, #{price}, #{reward}, #{requirements}, #{pics}, #{location}, #{geoId},#{msgDate},#{msgEndDate},#{msg2levelType},#{msgSingleType},#{priceDes},#{msgState},#{applyNum},#{seatNum},#{startPlace},#{aimPlace} FROM system_user AS u WHERE u.uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT m.mid, m.uid, m.user_name , m.headimgurl, m.msg_type , m.anonymity, m.title, m.description, m.business_address , m.business_name , m.price, m.reward, m.requirements, m.pics, m.publish_time, m.location, m.coord_type , m.msg_date,m.msg_end_date,m.msg_2level_type,m.msg_single_type,m.price_des,m.msg_state,m.apply_num,m.seat_num,m.start_place,m.aim_place,m.tribe_id, s.prise_num , s.comment_num, s.share_num, s.apply_for_num FROM dynamic_msg AS m, dynamic_msg_statistic AS s WHERE m.mid = s.mid ORDER BY m.mid desc LIMIT 20
